1556620.name: Cognition Method: Initiation Soundtrack
1556620.description:
A set of additional tracks inspired by the atmosphere of Cognition Method, not included with the main game.
Samples used in the creation of these tracks feature recordings of ambient radio signals from Jupiter.
Plunge into the mysterious atmosphere of a space expedition gone missing with this experimental post-rock music.
This compelling soundtrack is almost certain to evoke feelings in its' listeners.



The album comes in 10 special tracks in high-quality MP3 (320kbps)
